frontmatter.title: Architecture and Technology Playbook for Container Platform
frontmatter.description: Notes based on field experiences from Garage on modernizing applications, integration and platform towards a Cloud approach

internal.content:
--- title: Architecture and Technology Playbook for Container Platform description: Notes based on field experiences from Garage on modernizing applications, integration and platform towards a Cloud approach --- export const Title = () => ( Architecture and Technology Playbook for Container Platform

Move towards cloud-native aproaches

 ); Move towards cloud-native, leveraging what you already have. Notes based on field experiences from the IBM Garage for Cloud for modernizing your applications, integrations and establishing a platform to take advantage of a Cloud approach. ### How do you succeed? Follow the proven path ![](ref-arch/images/ref-arch.png)
